summary: Junior Software Developer with hands-on experience building responsive web applications, developing scheduling tools, and automating workflows. Strong background in React, Next.js, Node.js, and database management. Proven ability to collaborate with cross-functional teams and deliver high-quality solutions in Agile environments.

experience.title: Associate
description: Spearheaded development of dynamic web features, translating 50+ user stories into seamless, production-ready components.
Engineered solutions for real-world business challenges, collaborating closely with QA and design teams in fast-paced Agile sprints.
Diagnosed and resolved critical front-end and back-end bugs, improving application reliability and user satisfaction.
Bridged the gap between technical complexity and user needs, presenting design updates to stakeholders with clarity and precision.

experience.title: Software Engineer (Internship)
description: Designed and deployed internal scheduling tools that optimized nuclear fuel storage operations and informed strategic planning.
Streamlined documentation workflows by automating daily reporting processes, enabling faster sign-offs by field engineers.
Communicated technical concepts effectively across multidisciplinary teams, driving the adoption of innovation-driven solutions.
Secured buy-in from leadership for new digital tools by pitching value propositions to non-technical executives.

projects.name: Saood-Imran.com
projects.description: Built a professional-grade portfolio website using React and AWS, integrating a secure contact form with anti-spam protections to streamline inbound opportunities.

projects.name: MovieZen (Capstone)
projects.description: Developed an AI-powered movie recommendation platform, combining chatbot-driven conversations with sentiment analysis algorithms to personalize recommendations and drive engagement.

projects.name: Autumnae Shop
projects.description: Architecting a mobile-first e-commerce platform using Next.js, Supabase, Express, and Stripe, with a focus on secure transactions, dynamic product management, and an intuitive admin dashboard.

projects.name: AniRename
projects.description: Engineered a Python-based desktop app to automate media library organization, featuring a Tkinter GUI, API integration, caching layers for efficiency, and undo capabilities for safe operations.
